name: Quick Contact Box
author: Antonio Scarfì - Maurizio Tarchini

sections.description:
Quick contact box is a nice widget that shows:
1. phone numbers
1. address
1. email

in three different boxes.

Quick Contact Box is based on JavaScript / jQuery plugin that has a nice transition effect between a box and each other.

Quick Contact Box produces output valid xhtml and css

A brief Markdown Example
sections.installation:
1. Upload folder am-quick-contact-box to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the widget through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Drag the widget in the sidebar and configure

short_description: Quick contact box is a nice widget that shows phone numbers, address and email
